Reviews.Title: good vacation camera
Reviews.Author: Disney duo
Reviews.Content: Love the different settings and can't wait to take it to Disney and go on splash mountain with it. Now I wont be worried about getting it wet. Also can't wait to use it in Bahamas snorkeling. Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good buy! Nice camera and accessories.
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I like the camera a lot. The case and memory card are nice. The other accessories are of average quality, but a good buy for the money. A good price for the camera with all the accessories. The camera took nice pictures and video.
